news.title: Three former bosses of Lucy Letby arrested on suspicion of gross negligence manslaughter
news.summary: All three worked at the Countess of Chester Hospital when the nurse killed babies at its neonatal unit.

news.title: UK sees hottest day of 2025 as heatwave peaks
news.summary: Temperatures are set to fall after a scorching days in parts of England.

news.title: Family pay tribute to girl, 7, killed by falling tree
news.summary: Leonna Ruka died after being injured in a Southend park and her family calls her "a light in our lives".

news.title: US Senate Republicans narrowly pass Trump's 'big, beautiful'  bill
news.summary: Vice-President JD Vance casts the tie-breaking vote after more than 24 hours of intense debate, sending the bill back to the House.

news.title: M&S should be 'fully online' within four weeks, boss says
news.summary: The retailer continues to recover from a cyber attack that is expected to hit profits by Â£300m.
